newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- Merrill ups Consolidated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- Merrill ups Consolidated.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch Jeff Kaufman said he raised his rating on Consolidated Freightways Inc to long-term buy from accumulate and raised his 1997 year earnings estimate on Consolidated.
-- The analyst said he maintained his near-term accumulate accumulate rating on the transportation stock.
-- Kaufman said he raised his 1997 year estimate to $1.85 per share from $1.70 per share previously.
-- He also boosted his 12-month target price on the stock to $28 to $29, up from a range of $26 to $27 previously.
-- The analyst said he expected the company to earn $0.36 per share in the current quarter, excluding a one-time charge of $0.32 per share.
